text: Angelica Chain (born Angelica Chahin Mart√≠nez; May 12, 1956) is a Mexican actress, model and vedette. She is best known for her acting in fichera (Mexican sex comedy) films, many of which she participated playing the couple of another famous Mexican actor, Alfonso Zayas. Chain was once considered a sex symbol in Mexico. Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:People from Veracruz
title: Angelica Chain
